description: This time around we've got a hot solo that Hops did for us a while back. We just love seeing Hops chomp down on that cigar   so dang hot!Hops has been in many of our features, including Long Deployment 3, Below Deck, About Face 2, Long Deployment 2, Twin Soldiers 2 and Drafted 2. Busy as a bee, ain't he?
title: Hops, Scene #01
